CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 9, 1964, pg. 6 reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Morris Fountain Jr....bride and groom - Harris Photo." Portion of accompanying article reads: "The Church of the Holy Cross (Episcopal) was the scene, April 25, of the wedding rites of Marilyn Ruth Thomas and Morris Steven Fountain Jr.  The bride, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Roger P. Thomas and the groom, son of Mr. and Mrs. Morris S. Fountain Sr., both are from pioneer families of Pittsburgh."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of wedding party, from left: two men, Jonathan "Charlie" Fountain, groom Morris Steven Fountain, Jr., bride Marilyn Ruth Thomas Fountain, including Judith Jenkins, Patricia Hatcher, and Grace Mitchell, ring bearer Richard Barnett and flower girl Charlene Foggie Barnett, posed in Holy Cross Episcopal church
